title: Huge lag spikes on NA Servers
body:
Is anyone else having lag problems on NA servers? I know it is not my computer or internet. By my team and the enemy team had severe lag throughout my most recent game. 

Any word on this?

replies.body:
Hey everybody. There's a thread on the Service Status forum. Here you go!

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3875228

There seem to be issues on NA.
My friends just got out of a game and were reporting this as well. They decided to stop playing for the night because of it.
Lost my promos because of it :/ hopefully fixed soon

I crashed during a ranked game.. the moment i engaged, 3 people from my team D/c and we lost the fight because of the huge lag spikes. I know ranked queues are now disabled but still, it really changed the outcome of my matched and ended on a defeat 
 for my part.
still getting lag spikes in the severs
Same my speed test shows 30 MB per second and lag for 8 people my whole team and 3 of the enemy team the other 2 pushed to win.
Same here, it took about 5+ seconds to register anything.
I am getting this as well. currently sitting at "Attempting to Reconnect" @ 500 ms.
Its odd, but i would say that 90% of the people who I have played with in the last year, only died because of lag.

Meanwhile @EUNE 3 days live maintenance(http://forums.eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=622276). Not sure how valid is that excuse for lag. Not to mention before, every game in the past few weeks I get at least 1 DC/game, lasting 10 sec - 2 mins. I can normally alt-tab to client and chat in client, browse the web, etc.  
I guess no one can escape lag. Hopefully it will get fixed earlier for you, if it's not already.
Lag is still going on in the ranks, i tried out a custom game and all is fine, but not in the ranks
